TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questa classe include anche metodi per la scrittura un a un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package e leggere un da un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] pacchetto che viene fornita una stringa che rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del .This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . Vedere le classi di base e per note importanti sull'utilizzo.See the base classes and for important usage notes.

Anche le proprietà del oggetto può restituire un riferimento null ().
